title: Spencer ship opportunity
body:
I'd like to talk to some teams and preferably some Australian university teams about pricing sponsorship. I run Macquarie banks IT graduate program and I'm looking to improve the programs visibility by sponsoring a team. 

Open to discussions around teams also playing in the pro league here. 

Drop me an email if interested - is also like to hear from someone from riot to get some basic stats around viewer numbers globally and growth of LOL to help substantiate the investment. 

Jason.sandery@macquarie.com
